title: Txistorra (my way)
directions: Meat and fat ground on 8 mm/~5/16" plate. Mixed well with the seasoning and yoghurt. Stuffed in 65 cm/2 ft lengths (to fit in the chamber). Sprayed with mould culture and fermented for 36 hours at 22 C/72 F and 90+% RH. Then dried at 12 C/54 F and appx. 80% RH until 30% weight loss (five days).
ingredients: 20 g mild Pimentón de la Vera (smoked paprika) - (comment: I would add more like 200g)
6 g hot Pimentón de la Vera (smoked paprika)
Yoghurt (lactic acid fermentation starter) and mould culture
